question: Which were the participants of the final match of the first Cricket World Cup of 1975?
explanation: West Indies and Australia were the participants of the final match of the first Cricket World Cup of 1975. The 1975 Cricket World Cup (officially called the Prudential Cup '75) was the inaugural Cricket World Cup and the first major tournament in the history of One Day International (ODI) cricket. Organised by the International Cricket Conference (ICC), it took place in England between 7 June and 21 June 1975.
